Simulate Genetic Sequence Data for Pedigrees.

Methods to simulate genetic sequence data for pedigrees, with functionality to simulate genetic heterogeneity among pedigrees. Christina Nieuwoudt, Angela Brooks-Wilson, and Jinko Graham (2019) <doi:10.1101/534552>
name: SimRVSequences

metadata.abstract: Â© 2019 The Author(s). Published by Oxford University Press.Summary: We present the R package SimRVSequences to simulate sequence data for pedigrees. SimRVSequences allows for simulations of large numbers of single-nucleotide variants (SNVs) and scales well with increasing numbers of pedigrees. Users provide a sample of pedigrees and SNV data from a sample of unrelated individuals.
metadata.title: SimRVSequences: An R package to simulate genetic sequence data for pedigrees
